metadata.title: USN-6768-1 -- GLib vulnerability
metadata.description: Alicia Boya Garc√≠a discovered that GLib incorrectly handled signal subscriptions. A local attacker could use this issue to spoof D-Bus signals resulting in a variety of impacts including possible privilege escalation.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6768-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-girepository-3.0 - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 gir1.2-girepository-3.0-dev - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 gir1.2-glib-2.0 - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 gir1.2-glib-2.0-dev - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libgirepository-2.0-0 - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libgirepository-2.0-dev - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-0t64 - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-bin - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-data - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-dev - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-dev-bin - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-doc - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 libglib2.0-tests - 2.80.0-6ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
